action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ X ▢ X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix with Xs and empty squares. The Xs form a diagonal line from the top left to the bottom right, with an additional X in the second row, fourth column.

Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X X X
▢ X X X X
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with a diagonal pattern of empty squares (▢) from the top right to the bottom left, and all other squares filled with Xs.

QUESTION: Are there any empty squares (▢) in the diagonal line from the top left to the bottom right of your grid?
